typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Type as string,
		Duration as timestamp,
		MaxHeartRate as double,
		AvgHeartRate as double,
		DistanceKM as double,
		AvgSpeed as double,
		StepCount as double,
		StepCadence as double,
		FlightsClimbed as double,
		ActiveCal as double,
		TotalCal as double,
		DurationMins as integer,
		StartTS as timestamp,
		EndTS as timestamp,
		StartDT as date,
		EndDT as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['stg/dayWorkout.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> stgprqfiels
stgprqfiels sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		WORKTYPE as string,
		DURATIONMINS as integer,
		MAXHEARTRATE as integer,
		AVGHEARTRATE as integer,
		DISTANCEKM as decimal(10,2),
		AVGSPEED as decimal(10,2),
		STEPCOUNT as integer,
		STEPCADENCE as decimal(10,3),
		FLIGHTSCLIMBED as integer,
		ACTIVECAL as integer,
		TOTALCAL as integer,
		STARTTS as timestamp,
		ENDTS as timestamp,
		STARTDT as date,
		ENDDT as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		WORKTYPE = Type,
		DURATIONMINS = DurationMins,
		MAXHEARTRATE = MaxHeartRate,
		AVGHEARTRATE = AvgHeartRate,
		DISTANCEKM = DistanceKM,
		AVGSPEED = AvgSpeed,
		STEPCOUNT = StepCount,
		STEPCADENCE = StepCadence,
		FLIGHTSCLIMBED = FlightsClimbed,
		ACTIVECAL = ActiveCal,
		TOTALCAL = TotalCal,
		STARTTS = StartTS,
		ENDTS = EndTS,
		STARTDT = StartDT,
		ENDDT = EndDT
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> toSQLTAB
